SummaryEnglish: Fifteen year old Kyosuke Kasuga moves to a new city and becomes enamoured by one Madoka Ayukawa, whom often treats him coldly even though she seemed friendly the first time they met, when he caught her red straw hat on the stairs. Kyosuke also must try to avoid breaking the heart of the slightly childish Hikaru Hiyama, whom fell in love with him after she saw him make an impossible shot with a basketball and whom likes to shower him with affection. Also, just to make things interesting, Kyosuke, his sisters, his grandfather, and his cousins all have various powers (teleportation, psychokinesis, hypnosis, time travel, personality transferrence) which Kyosuke desperately tries to keep a secret, though some of the other family members have no such qualms against using their powers in public.

1.SummaryEnglish: A special made before the rest of the KOR anime to test the possibility of making more. Essentially an alternate TV version of episode 48 , Kyosuke and Madoka go to the beach only to be trapped alone together. Similarly to other popular Shounen Jump titles, Kimagure Orange Road premiered with this story during the 1985 Jump Festival and features different staff and voicecast from the later television series. It was released to video on 16.08.1989.

6.SummaryEnglish: The gang visits Kyosuke's grandparents in northern Japan for a skiing vacation, but an ancient curse causes an avalanche of trouble.

7.SummaryEnglish: A Hawaiian vacation goes awry when Hikaru is mistaken for an heiress and kidnapped! When Madoka and Kyosuke try to rescue her, things quickly get out of hand.

8.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: I Was a Cat, I Was a Fish
8.SummaryEnglish: A magical rope causes Kyosuke to swap souls, first with the family's pet goldfish, and then with Jingoro, their cat! When he's found by Madoka and Hikaru, he gets a private lesson on how girls behave when they're alone.

9.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: Hurricane! Akane, the Shapechanging Girl
9.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke's tomboy cousin Akane, who has the power to impersonate anyone, comes to visit -- and falls in love with Madoka!

10.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: Stage of Love = Heart on Fire! (Spring is for Idols!)
10.SummaryEnglish: Hayakawa, a famous singer, comes to town to host a battle of the bands. An accidental head-on collision with Kyosuke results in the two swapping bodies, and Hayakawa wastes no time puting the moves on Hikaru and Madoka!

11.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: Stage of Love = Heart on Fire! (Birth of a star!)
11.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke tries to convince Hayakawa not to talk about his experience and races to find Madoka and get her to the contest on time. Fortunately, he can teleport...

12.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: An Unexpected Situation
12.SummaryEnglish: Akane suckers Kyosuke into pretending to be her boyfriend so she can impress her friends.

13.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: Message in Rouge
13.SummaryEnglish: Madoka runs away from home because she believes her father is cheating on her mother. What will Kyosuke do when she asks to stay the night?

14.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: I Want to Return to That Day
14.SummaryEnglish: On a brisk early spring day, Kyosuke's thoughts range back to the previous summer... where amid struggling to prepare for exams amid the many distractions of youth, he and Madoka finally came to grips with their feelings for one another, and he tried not to break Hikaru's heart. The bittersweet conclusion to the series.

15.TitleEnglish: New Kimagure Orange Road: Summer's Beginning
15.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke awakens after a traffic accident to discover that three years have passed, and that his entire life is falling apart!

16.SummaryEnglish: Tanabata is approaching but Kyousuke, being his usual indecisive self, is unable to invite Madoka to a concert and later gets beaten up after making Hikaru cry. In a hospital room Madoka approaches a sleeping Kyousuke, and then... This special was released direct to video and is a compilation of the episodes 13 and 14 of the television series.

17.TitleEnglish: Kimagure Orange Road: Futari no Koi no Repertoire
17.SummaryEnglish: Twelve Kimagure Orange Road songs, both from the series and new, set to footage from the series.

1.TitleEnglish: A Transfer Student! 'Tis Embarrassing to Say, but I'll Fall in Love for the First Time
1.SummaryEnglish: Kasuga Kyosuke moves to a new town and meets two unusual girl; we learn of his family's unusual gifts; and realize that it isn't easy being a cat.

2.TitleEnglish: A Little Lemony Kiss for Her
2.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke uses his powers when he shouldn't, and Hikaru becomes infatuated. We are also introduced to the "legendary" Cutlet Sandwich.

3.SummaryEnglish: Komatsu and Hatta lust after Kyosuke's sisters, and Kyosuke's plans to date Hikaru end up with him all wet.

4.SummaryEnglish: Rumors that Hikaru and Kyosuke have gone all the way set the school on fire. Needless to say, Madoka is not impressed.

5.TitleEnglish: A Secret For Two – A Problematic Part-Time Job
5.SummaryEnglish: A chance encounter by Hikaru leads Kyosuke to believe that Madoka is having an affair with an older man, and when the truth is revealed, brings them closer.

6.TitleEnglish: That Kid's My Rival – Midterm Exam of Love
6.SummaryEnglish: Madoka tutors Kyosuke for some crucial exams, while a the same time Kyosuke tutors Hikaru. Meanwhile, an angry young man wants Kyosuke's head for stealing his girl!

7.TitleEnglish: Madoka's Private Life?! A Spark-Colored Kiss
7.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke gets concerned when it seems that Madoka is considerabley more "experienced" than he is.

8.TitleEnglish: You're Smiling! A "Shutter-Chance" at the Beach
8.SummaryEnglish: Hikaru is "discovered" by a photographer and gets a modeling job, but the trip to the beach to keep an eye on her has happy consequences for Kyosuke and Madoka.

9.TitleEnglish: Kurumi, I'll Teach You How To Date
9.SummaryEnglish: When Kyosuke's sister Kurumi is apparently kidnapped, he learns a lot about his friends.

10.TitleEnglish: A Foreboding Dream?! Hikaru is Dying
10.SummaryEnglish: A precognitive dream convinces Kyosuke that Hikaru is about to die, and when Hikaru learns of this, she decides to use his anxiety to get closer to him.

11.SummaryEnglish: Circumstances convince Kyosuke that Madoka is about to get married, resulting in a hilarious "The Graduate" parody ending.

12.TitleEnglish: Study Abroad in America. Good-bye, Madoka!
12.SummaryEnglish: Madoka decides to move to America to be closer to her musician parents, sending all her friends into a panic.

13.TitleEnglish: Everyone is Looking! Hikaru's Super Transformation
13.SummaryEnglish: Kyosukes feelings for Madoka get wobbly when Hikaru gets a makeover that makes her look much more mature.

14.TitleEnglish: A Foreboding Dream! Madoka and Kyosuke are Breaking Up At Last!
14.SummaryEnglish: Afraid of being looked down upon by Madoka as a wimp, Kyosuke overdoes it trying to quickly become a hunk.

15.TitleEnglish: Madoka's Ultimate Decision! Putting a Period to the Love Triangle
15.SummaryEnglish: When Hikaru fears that Kyosuke has a new girlfriend, she turns to Madoka for advice on how to win him back!

16.TitleEnglish: Well, Do You Believe it or Not? Madoka Saw a UFO
16.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke and Madoka see a UFO, but Kyosukes's reluctance to confirm her story lands him in the doghouse!

17.TitleEnglish: The Summer Temptation - A Double Date Out Of the Blue
17.SummaryEnglish: Durnng the summer break, Kyosuke makes two dates and finds himself frantically teleporting between Hikaru at the pool and Madoka at the library.

18.TitleEnglish: Madoka's Challenge! The Haunted Beach Big Wave Legend
18.SummaryEnglish: A trip to the seashore ensnares everyone in a spooky mystery, and Madoka must challenge the legendary "Big Monday"!

19.TitleEnglish: An Experience for Two! An Island of Forbidden Love
19.SummaryEnglish: Stranded on a deserted island, Kyosuke finds himself alone in paradise with Madoka!

20.TitleEnglish: Hikaru Witnesses! The Camp is Full of Dangers!
20.SummaryEnglish: Kurumi's "help" allows Kyosuke to excel at Tennis Camp, allowing him to get closer to Madoka. Unfortunately, Hikaru sees him getting closer to Madoka...

21.TitleEnglish: Kyosuke in a Pinch! Sweet Nothings at the Wuthering Heights
21.SummaryEnglish: While still at the tennis camp, Kyosuke gets into a compromising situation with another girl. Madoka is not amused!

22.TitleEnglish: An Adult Relationship? Madoka Secretly Returns Home in the Morning
22.SummaryEnglish: When Madoka suddenly vanishes, Kyosuke becomes concerned. He becomes even more concerned when he sees her exiting a nightclub with another man!

23.TitleEnglish: Kyosuke and Madoka in a Big Fight! – A Three-Legged Race of Love
23.SummaryEnglish: Egos get in the way when Kyosuke and Madoka are chosen to represent their class in the big school marathon.

24.TitleEnglish: Introducing Kazuya! Be Very Careful around the "Panic Kid"
24.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke's little cousin Kazuya arrives for a visit. Unfortunately for Kyosuke, Kazuya is tuned into his brain waves and does everything he thinks!

25.SummaryEnglish: After being picked on by his family for being so indecisive, Kyosuke accidentally hypnotizes himself and becomes a confident ladies man. How will he fare with Madoka, however?

26.TitleEnglish: Kyosuke's Become a Kid! Getting Super Close to Madoka
26.SummaryEnglish: When Kyosuke learns that he can switch bodies with his little cousin Kazuya, he hatches a plot to use Kazuya's telepathic abilities to find out exactly what Madoka thinks about him!

27.TitleEnglish: Marked Woman Madoka! Kyosuke, Proving He's a Man
27.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke tries to protect Madoka from a gang of tough girls, but it is Hikaru that winds up in their cross hairs!

28.SummaryEnglish: Manami changes her image with a glamorous makeover; only to get in trouble with some bad girls. Kyosuke, in heroic disguise, tries to rescue the damsel in distress -- and neither knows who the other is!

29.TitleEnglish: Don't Cry, Jingoro! The Heat of Young Love
29.SummaryEnglish: Strange behavior by Jingoro leads to a frenzied quest to find a mate for the poor cat. But what does Jingoro really want?

30.TitleEnglish: A Tender Little Story! Kurumi's First Love – "Chapter Hell"
30.SummaryEnglish: Kurumi's first crush leads to chaos and confusion when Kyosuke discovers that the object of her desire wants Madoka instead!

31.TitleEnglish: Madoka and Yuusaku! The Marching Song of Runaway Youths
31.SummaryEnglish: Yuusaku confesses his love for Madoka in front of Kyosuke, and soon the two are spending a lot of time together. When they head off to a known "suicide mecca", Kyosuke assumes the worst!

32.TitleEnglish: Will My Birthday Come Twice? Time-Runner Kyosuke
32.SummaryEnglish: When everyone forgets Kyosuke's birthday, he self-hypnotizes himself and becomes very untrusting. Only his unreliable time-travel ability can get him out of the resulting jam!

33.TitleEnglish: Mystical Madoka! The Mushrooms of 120% Truthfulness
33.SummaryEnglish: While out on a hiking trip, the gang discovers the legendary "Mushrooms of Truth". One bite, and you'll confess your innermost secrets...

34.TitleEnglish: Roots Panic! Madoka in the Mysterious Homeland
34.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke's grandparents invite the gang to visit them in the country, and drive Kyosuke up the wall because they aren't very careful about using their powers!

35.TitleEnglish: Naughty with a Camera! Robot Kyo
35.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke is hypnotized by Kurumi and commanded to be obedient, only to end up becoming Hatta and Komatsu's slave. Discovering the hold they have over him, the two perverts order Kyosuke to get nude pictures of Madoka!

36.TitleEnglish: Adios, Kyosuke! Paranormal Powers Caught On Video!
36.SummaryEnglish: When Komatsu and Hatta accidentally witness Kyosuke teleporting, they use the student film they are making as a vehicle to try and expose him!

37.TitleEnglish: Heroic Orange Legend! Madoka's Duel in the Blizzard
37.SummaryEnglish: Madoka's past comes back to haunt her when she helps out an old friend, and ends up in a duel with a gang leader!

38.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke's unreliable time traveling ability gets put to the test as he repeats a day several times, each time trying to make things better...

39.TitleEnglish: Hypnotizing Madoka! Kyosuke's Risky New Year's
39.SummaryEnglish: When Kyosuke tries to hypnotize Madoka as a joke, he ends up actually doing it. Now Madoka will do anything he wants... anything at all!

40.TitleEnglish: First Dream of the New Year! Jingoro the Giant Monster Strikes Back!
40.SummaryEnglish: New Year's Special. The KOR characters play various roles in this parody of "Top Gun" and Toho monster films.

41.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke's grandfather hands him a pocket watch that allows him to actually stop time - for normal human beings! But using it too much is so very tempting...

42.TitleEnglish: Such a Popular Madoka! Kyosuke Finally Reveals His Feelings
42.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke has a real problem when a young girl named Sumire gets a crush... on Madoka!

43.TitleEnglish: Heartbroken Hikaru! Follow Her to the Winter Beach
43.SummaryEnglish: Hikaru is crushed to learn that Kyosuke and Yukari spent the night together. Of course, they didn't actually do anything wrong, but...

44.TitleEnglish: The Taste of Love? Kyosuke's Hellish Valentine
44.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya ambushes Kyosuke and switches bodies with him, so that Kyosuke will have to go to the dentist in his place. The sweet-toothed Kazyua, in Kyosuke's body, is out to get all the Valentine's Day chocolate he can!

45.TitleEnglish: Hikaru Passes Away; And Then There Were None
45.SummaryEnglish: Kyosuke wishes that Hikaru would get sick so he could spend more time with Madoka. He gets his wish and then some... Hikaru's dead!

46.TitleEnglish: One Snow-White Night! Two, Alone inside a Gondola!
46.SummaryEnglish: Trapped in a gondola, and with his powers exhausted; Kyosuke must try to keep himself and Madoka from freezing to death!

47.TitleEnglish: A Presentiment of Farewells. Locate Madoka's First Love
47.SummaryEnglish: When Madoka tells Kyosuke about an old promise; that she'd vowed 6 years ago to meet someone again on this very day, Kyosuke travels back in time to find out who her "first love" was.

48.TitleEnglish: I Found Love – And, Repeat From Beginning
48.SummaryEnglish: Madoka's father has fallen ill, and she must leave Japan to visit him. Unable to find Kyosuke in order to say good-bye, Kyosuke's grandfather "helpfully" sends her back in time 6 years to where Kyosuke is now and was then!
